snippet.title: LBTA Tools: Simplify Code with Variadic Arguments in Functions
snippet.description:
To simplify the code in your projects, you can implement custom functions that take in a varying list of arguments.  This concept is known as a variadic argument in Swift. In today's lesson, I'll go over how to write one of these functions in code. Enjoy.
